result.execSummary:
Shannon Ray Stevens was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Shannon Ray Stevens was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shannon Ray Stevens

records.addlTxt: Copy of criminal complaint and waiver of extradition mailed to Governor's office.
This did not take place. Court event needs to be in court record to dispose of case.

ADDRESS INFO for Shannon Ray Stevens
Current: 9190 County Rd D, Webster, WI 54893 United States  (Effective: 01-05-2022)
Prior: 750 Main St. #2, Baldwin, WI 54002

02:00 PM Defendant Shannon Ray Stevens in court via zoom, in custody.  Kaley Walker appeared for the State of Wisconsin via zoom.   Defendant has copy of complaint. Defendant: not fighting extradition and does not want representation.  Constitutional rights explained to defendant. Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights. Defendant wishes to return to Chisago County Minnesota. 2:07 Court recesses. 2:09 Court resumes and Def has copy of Waiver of Extradtion. Defendant signs waiver. Court will sign when presented. 2:10
